20110120020634.000|20110120020636.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CONAN, GOOD NEWS.  
20110120020636.000|20110120020637.000|CC1|SOME GOOD NEWS HERE TONIGHT.    
20110120020637.000|20110120020639.000|CC1|DOCTORS HERE AT HARBOR UCLA MED 
20110120020639.000|20110120020641.000|CC1|CENTER SAY THAT THE GIRL OPENED 
20110120020641.000|20110120020643.000|CC1|HER EYES THIS MORNING, AND SHE'S
20110120020643.000|20110120020644.000|CC1|RESPONDSING TO COMMANDS TO MOVE 
20110120020644.000|20110120020646.000|CC1|HER -- RESPONDING TO COMMANDS TO
20110120020646.000|20110120020646.000|CC1|MOVE HER LIMBS.                 
20110120020646.000|20110120020647.000|CC1|SHE'S GOT A LONG WAY TO GO      
20110120020647.000|20110120020648.000|CC1|BEFORE RETURNING HOME.          
20110120020648.000|20110120020652.000|CC1|TWO VICTIMS, A BOY AND A GIRL,  
20110120020652.000|20110120020653.000|CC1|BOTH 15, RUSHED BY AMBULANCE    
20110120020653.000|20110120020655.000|CC1|FROM GARDENA HIGH SCHOOL

20110120020658.000|20110120020700.000|CC1|A FELLOW STUDENT'S PISTOL FIRED 
20110120020700.000|20110120020701.000|CC1|ACCIDENTLY THAT LIVES MAY HAVE  
20110120020701.000|20110120020703.000|CC1|BEEN SAVED.

20110120020704.000|20110120020705.000|CC1|CASE OF THE GIRL.
